attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In response to the shockingly poor logo which apparently cost £400,000 to produce, We the  undersigned, would like to see a change of logo from the very poor effort which has been produced so far to a more representative logo which does not look like Chav scribble from the back seat of a bus.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
